00019 - (void)viewDidLoad {
00020     [super viewDidLoad];
00021 
00022     // Uncomment the following line to display an Edit button in the navigation bar for this view controller.
00023     // self.navigationItem.rightBarButtonItem = self.editButtonItem;
00024         [self.tableView retain];
00025         
00026         self.navigationItem.title = @"Sections";
00027 }

00029 // Override to allow orientations other than the default portrait orientation.
00030 - (BOOL)shouldAutorotateToInterfaceOrientation:(UIInterfaceOrientation)interfaceOrientation {
00031     // Return YES for supported orientations
00032     return (interfaceOrientation == UIInterfaceOrientationPortrait) ||
00033         (interfaceOrientation == UIInterfaceOrientationLandscapeLeft) ||
00034         (interfaceOrientation == UIInterfaceOrientationLandscapeRight);
00035 }

00044 #pragma mark Table view methods
00045 
00046 - (NSInteger)numberOfSectionsInTableView:(UITableView *)tableView {
00047     return 1;
00048 }
00049 
00050 // Customize the number of rows in the table view.
00051 - (NSInteger)tableView:(UITableView *)tableView numberOfRowsInSection:(NSInteger)section {
00052     return [[[Database db] sections] count];
00053 }
00054 
00055 // Customize the appearance of table view cells.
00056 - (UITableViewCell *)tableView:(UITableView *)tv cellForRowAtIndexPath:(NSIndexPath *)indexPath {
00057         NSLog(@"cellForRowAtIndexPath: tableView=%@ tv=%@ indexPath=%@",
00058                   tableView,tv,indexPath);
00059     static NSString *CellIdentifier = @"Cell";
00060     
00061     UITableViewCell *cell = [tv dequeueReusableCellWithIdentifier:CellIdentifier];
00062     if (cell == nil) {
00063         cell = [[[UITableViewCell alloc] initWithStyle:UITableViewCellStyleDefault reuseIdentifier:CellIdentifier] autorelease];
00064     }
00065     
00066         // Configure the cell.
00067         Section *s = [[[Database db] sections] objectAtIndex:[indexPath row]];
00068         NSLog(s.name);
00069         [cell.textLabel setText:[s name]];
00070         cell.tag = [[s identifier] intValue];
00071         
00072         // Do NOT release the object here or bad things will happen.  You have been warned.
00073         //[s release];
00074         
00075     return cell;
00076 }
00077 
00078 // Override to support row selection in the table view.
00079 - (void)tableView:(UITableView *)tv didSelectRowAtIndexPath:(NSIndexPath *)indexPath {
00080         UITableViewCell *cell = [tv cellForRowAtIndexPath:indexPath];
00081         EntriesController *ec = [[EntriesController alloc] initWithSection:[[Database db] sectionFromIdentifier:[NSNumber numberWithInt:cell.tag]]];
00082         [super.navigationController pushViewController:ec animated:YES];
00083         [ec release];
00084 }
00085

00087     [super dealloc];
00088 }
